page.title: 10CARNIVALS
page.content: Shanklin Carnival is held every year in July. There are many floats that come from all over the Island.There are Carnival Queens from every main town.Most of the money raised goes to various Charities on the Island.It is a splendid colourful occasion and nearly everyone takes part and has fun.It starts near Shanklin Hospital and finishes at Shanklin County Ground where there is a large fair. People stand by the pavements putting money in collection boxes. Shanklin Carnival is one of the main summer events of the Island.
